SimpleMeshVFX.name: Simple Mesh VFX
SimpleMeshVFX.description:
A Mesh emitter with Start/End format
- Supports decal tweens & flipbooks
- MeshParts, Parts, Unions, SpecialMesh
- EmitCount, SpreadAngle, and more

MoreAttributes.name: More attributes & util
MoreAttributes.description:
Makes it easier to add plugin attributes
- EmitIgnore, EmitClone, ResetOnFinish
- They are built-in (don't require add-on)
- not finished yet (3 more attributes)

ScreenEffects.name: Screen effects
ScreenEffects.description:
- ImpactFrames (CCE)
- CameraShake (with presets)
- Camera weld (VFX on screen)
ImpactFrames emit others enable
